data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Benevento get the game underway.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula has run offside.
In the minute 2, Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Benevento.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Gianluca Aureliano signals a Spezia throw-in in Benevento's half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Emmanuel Gyasi of Spezia is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 7, Gianluca Aureliano awards the home team a throw-in.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Benevento.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 14, Christian Maggio is replacing Daam Foulon for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In Benevento, Emmanuel Gyasi (Spezia) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Benevento.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
Gianluca Aureliano awards Benevento a goal kick.
Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 19, Spezia are whistled for offside.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a Spezia throw-in in Benevento's half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 21, Spezia's Kevin Agudelo breaks free at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
In the minute 28, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tommaso Pobega puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Salva Ferrer with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Roberto Insigne for Benevento is whistled offside.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 32, Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Throw-in Spezia.
Benevento pushes forward through Marco Sau, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 34, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Benevento.
Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 36, In Benevento Spezia attack through Simone Bastoni. The finish is off target, however.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 39, M'bala Nzola for Spezia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Benevento.
Spezia's Emmanuel Gyasi gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Spezia.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Benevento Benevento's Roberto Insigne is caught offside.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, In Benevento, Benevento push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Attention is being given to Speziaâ€™s Julian Chabot and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) has taken off Julian Chabot who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Cristian Dell`Orco is the replacement.
The second-half has commenced. Spezia with the kick-off.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 46, Riccardo Improta is on a sub for Bryan Dabo for Benevento.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 47, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Riccardo Improta (Benevento) has received a first yellow card.
Benevento have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Riccardo Improta for the home team is judged to be offside.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Spezia are coming forward and Kevin Agudelo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Benevento in Benevento.
Simone Bastoni (Spezia) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 54, Luca Caldirola is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Free kick Benevento.
In the minute 56, Luca Caldirola is back on the pitch.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 57, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Benevento.
Kevin Agudelo (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a Spezia throw-in in Benevento's half.
In the minute 62, Gianluca Aureliano awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Matteo Ricci (Spezia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Spezia.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's now 0-2 in Benevento as M'bala Nzola scores for Spezia.
In the minute 65, That's a fine assist from Emmanuel Gyasi.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Benevento.
Gianluca Aureliano awards Benevento a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 69, Free kick Spezia.
Spezia's Nahuel Estevez is on target but unsuccessful.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
In the minute 70, Goal! M'bala Nzola extends Spezia lead to 0-3 with a header.
Great play from Nahuel Estevez to set up the goal.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Spezia's M'bala Nzola is whistled for offside at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Gianluca Aureliano blows against Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula for offside.
In the minute 75, Benevento make their third substitution with Gabriele Moncini replacing Marco Sau.
Andres Tello is replacing Pasquale Schiattarella for the home team.
The home team have replaced Gaetano Letizia with Federico Barba. This is the fifth substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
In the minute 75, Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Ciro Vigorito with Riccardo Marchizza replacing Simone Bastoni.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Tommaso Pobega with Leo Sena.
In the minute 79, Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Spezia.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Nahuel Estevez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Lucien Agoume is on a sub for Nahuel Estevez for Spezia.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a fifth substitution, with Luca Mora replacing Matteo Ricci.
In the minute 83, Spezia are in shooting range from this free kick.
Christian Maggio (Benevento) gets a yellow card.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benevento's half?
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gianluca Aureliano awards the home team a throw-in.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Emmanuel Gyasi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Gianluca Lapadula of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Benevento.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Free kick Spezia.
The match has come to a close in Benevento. The final score is 0-3.
Luca Caldirola (Benevento) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
